p: The exclusion criteria are as follows: (1) unplanned or emergent surgery, (2) spinal and/or epidural anesthesia, (3) ACEIs/ARBs use only in the evening, intermittent ACEIs/ARBs use, or concomitant use of ACEIs and ARBs, (4) uncontrolled hypertension defined as systolic blood pressure (SBP) ≥ 180 mmHg or diastolic blood pressure (DBP) ≥ 110 mmHg, (5) baseline mean blood pressure (MBP) ≤ 65 mmHg, (6) intravenous use of vasoactive agents, (7) severe cardiopulmonary or cerebrovascular disease, (8) liver or kidney dysfunction (Child-Pugh grade ≥ B, creatinine ≥ 200 μmol/L), or (9) rejection of participation.
